words.def: a symptom of some physical hurt or disorder
monotypic genus of palms of Australasia
a piece of jewelry that is pinned onto the wearer's garment
perennial herb of East Indies to Polynesia and Australia
cooking utensil consisting of a wide metal vessel
a period of time spent sleeping
belonging to or on behalf of a specified person (especially yourself)

an informal term for a father
a silvery soft waxy metallic element of the alkali metal group
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
